coreAttributes.name: peplos
coreAttributes.description: A body-length garment, consisting of a long, rectangular cloth which is gathered about the waist and then pinned into place over the shoulders. The top half of the peplos is folded down, giving the appearance of a second piece of clothing.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(gather)] the peplos about [npc.her] waist, before folding the top edges over [npc.her] shoulders and pinning them in place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(gather)] the peplos about [npc2.namePos] waist, before folding the top edges over [npc2.her] shoulders and pinning them in place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(gather)] the peplos about [npc2.namePos] waist, before folding the top edges over [npc2.her] shoulders and pinning them in place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unpin)] the peplos, before taking it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unpin)] [npc2.namePos] peplos, before taking it off.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt of [npc.her] peplos back down into the proper position.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] peplos back down into the proper position.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the skirt [npc2.namePos] peplos back down into the proper position.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] hold of the skirt of [npc2.namePos] peplos, before roughly pulling it up.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unpin)] [npc.her] peplos and [npc.verb(allow)] the top half to fall down around [npc.her] waist.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unpin)] [npc2.namePos] peplos and [npc.verb(allow)] the top half to fall down around [npc2.her] waist.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unpin)] [npc2.namePos] peplos and [npc.verb(yank)] the top half down around [npc2.her] waist.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the top half of [npc.her] peplos and [npc.verb(pin)] the top edges into place over [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the top half of [npc2.namePos] peplos and [npc.verb(pin)] the top edges into place over [npc.her] shoulders.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] up the top half of [npc2.namePos] peplos and [npc.verb(pin)] the top edges into place over [npc.her] shoulders.
